post:
Webhosting.uk.com is glad to offer fully managed VPS hosting plans in the most affordable prices. These virtual private servers are no less than dedicated servers in terms of speed and performance. The Linux VPS hosting platform is powered by Virtuozzo technology and they are established on Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers that ensure optimum performance and better flexibility. Whereas the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V that ensures complete efficiency and uptime of the website. Both the Linux and Windows VPS hosting platforms are perfect for managing large websites and installing third party applications.

  • 512 MB Guaranteed RAM
  • Virtuozzo
  • Full Root SSH Access
  • 2 Dedicated IP's
  • Redundant Hotswap Servers
  • Database Support
  • Monthly Price : £ 18 GBP
